;REAL HEROES

;3

;DS_ALLIED			= 0	
;DS_SUSPICIOUS		= 100
;DS_NEUTRAL			= 200
;DS_HOSTILE			= 400
;DS_AT_WAR			= 600

;core views
;greek - greek
core_attitudes		romans_julii,		600		britons
core_attitudes		romans_julii,		300		slave
core_attitudes		britons,		600		romans_julii
core_attitudes		britons,		300		slave

;pirates
core_attitudes		slave,		300		romans_julii, britons


;faction starting relationships

;greek alliances
faction_relationships		romans_julii,		600		britons
faction_relationships		britons,		600		romans_julii


;pirate war with all
faction_relationships		slave,		600		romans_julii
faction_relationships		slave,		600		britons

faction_relationships		romans_julii,		600		slave
faction_relationships		britons,		600		slave
